Get managed pages, including name, page token, and id

cc_get_fb_managed_pages.Rd

Be mindful of the permissions associated with the current user token: you will probably need "pages_show_list", and, if pages are managed through a business manger, "business_management". If you don't get any response, the problem is most likely related to permissions, so try adding more permissions as relevant.

Usage

cc_get_fb_managed_pages(
  fields = c("id", "name"),
  fb_user_id = NULL,
  fb_user_token = NULL,
  api_version = "v22.0"
)

Arguments

fields

Defaults to `c("id", "name")`. Include "access_token" in order to retrieve you Facebook page access token.

fb_user_id

Facebook user id. Defaults to NULL, can be set with `cc_set()`. Can be retrieved with `cc_get_fb_user()`.

fb_user_token

Facebook user token (not a page token).

api_version

Defaults to "v21.0".

Value

A data frame (a tibble), with as many columns as fields (by default, `id` and `name`).

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
cc_get_fb_managed_pages()
} # }
